'''Rudolph Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Rudolph was the second son of [[Gundolpho Bolger]] and [[Alfrida of the Yale]]. He married [[Cora Goodbody]] and had one son, [[Fastolph Bolger|Fastolph]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Rudolph'' contains the elements ''hrod'' "fame" and ''wulf'' "wolf".
